channel.title: 2 B A Master
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "2 B A Master" - New Special Mission

item.title: Re: 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded:
Requirements for season 1 from my special missions -

Jonin or Sannin, Level 51+

item.title: Re: 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded:
Cashing In is the special mission to get a free shiny if you were already a Sannin as of yesterday. It gave you 1 random Golden Item (from the lotto in the party house).

2 B A Master is the special mission to get 1 random golden item if you've made top 3 player that day. I don't believe there are any other requirements to it.

You can only do one or the other of these missions in a season. In effect, you can get 1 random golden item per season if you do a successful top 3 run that season.

item.title: Re: 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded: Forgot to mention that I wasn't in a village at this point either, so that may be part of it.

item.title: Re: 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded:
Note that it wasn't from that mission, but a specific "reward" mission instead … I don't see THIS mission, but it could be once per day, or once per season…

Anyway, my reward looked like a raffle item.

item.title: Re: 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded: This is probably the mentioned mission for picking up a shiny for being in the top 3 … I was Sannin already, so was able to get what looks like a raffle item.

item.title: 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded: Just found a new special mission that ain't in the wiki. Requirements are level 51+, Jonin/Sannin and the first task is to be in the top three ranked people of the day. I didn't get any further than that though. Anyone able to go through it today, see what the next steps are?
